public class ASTArticleActionDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.ui.IObjectActionDelegate

The action delegate for both actions "Change Method Visability" and "Move Method Declaration".

Project page: http://sourceforge.net/projects/earticleast

Author:
Thomas Kuhn

createActionExuecutable

private AbstractASTArticle createActionExuecutable(java.lang.String id)
Creates the appropriate implementation of AbstractASTArticle.

Parameters:
id - the action ID
Returns:
if id is net.sourceforge.earticleast.app.astArticleAction1 an instance of ASTArticleMoveVariableDeclaration, if id is net.sourceforge.earticleast.app.astArticleAction2: an instance of ASTArticleChangeMethodVisibility
